info.name: Optimized 2D SDF
info.description:
Threre are 2 SDF techniques:
1. single channel SDF (ENABLE_PER_AXIS_SDF = 0)
2. dual channel SDF calculated for separate axises (ENABLE_PER_AXIS_SDF = 1), may work faster for rays that parallel to the walls.
